abstract: John Guzzetta and Michael Hawkins give our Friday puzzle some spice.
lead_paragraph: FRIDAY PUZZLE — I am a firm believer that everything benefits from seasoning, even crossword puzzles. When I cook, I like to spice things up, so opening a crossword puzzle with SRIRACHA hot sauce at 1A is right up my alley. Is it the hottest sauce on the planet? No, but that’s not the point, unless you are extremely competitive, like Rhett McLaughlin and Link Neal.
